text: is a Japanese sportswoman. She is best known as an archer who competed in the Summer Olympic Games.SportsReference.com (SR/Olympics), "Ren Hayakawa" ; retrieved 2012-7-30. ==Career== Hayakawa was part of a team which won the bronze medal in women's archery at the 2012 Summer Olympics. Hayakawa shot her arrow into the 10-point area in her final shot of the match.Mitsuhashi, Makoto. "Japan archers on target," Yomiuri Shimbun (Japan). July 31, 2012; retrieved 2012-7-30. This was Japan's first Olympic medal in any team archery event. ==Related pages== * Sports in Japan * Japan at the Olympics * Miki Kanie * Kaori Kawanaka == References == Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Japan Category:Japanese archers
title: Ren Hayakawa
